alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Southern Columbia; Suwannee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Columbia, northern Suwannee and southeastern Hamilton Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Live Oak, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Live Oak, White Springs, Wellborn, Suwannee Valley, Newburn and Houston. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
